DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study determine effect 12-week resistance training program cancer relate fatigue cancer patient receive tyrosine kinase inhibitor ( TKI ) therapy . It hypothesize incidence severity cancer relate fatigue reduce exercise train population lead improved treatment completion rate .
DOC.brief_title: Reduction Cancer Related Fatigue Patients During TKI Therapy
DOC.criteria: Male female cancer patient Prior tyrosine kinase inhibitor therapy ( substance , line ) Age : least 18 yrs Body mass index ( BMI ) : least 18 kg/m2 ECOG performance status : 2 Must able meet requirement study protocol Acute infectious diseases No ambulatory ability Severe neurological disorder Severe cardiovascular disease Severe pulmonary insufficiency Severe renal insufficiency Other current tumor disease Conditions render compliance impossible Participation regular strength training
